sentence: Leading the pack was Rep. Liz Cheney, R-Wyo., who pulled in more than $1.97 million during the last three months of 2021, bringing her yearly total to nearly $6.5 million.
title: Overnight News Digest February 1, 2022

sentence: Too bad Republicans missed their opportunity to convict Trump and do away with him forever or, as GOP Rep. Liz Cheney of Wyoming put it, "made themselves willing hostages" to a man who just fessed up to trying to stage a coup.
title: Trump's endorsement ad of David Perdue is perfectly divisive and comically awful

sentence: But the RNC's mishandling of the censure text has made the entire episode a referendum on the Jan. 6 attack, rather than on the two Republicans the RNC intended to penalize: Reps. Liz Cheney of Wyoming and Adam Kinzinger of Illinois.
author: Jon Ward
title: GOP's bungling of Cheney, Kinzinger censure resolution draws rebuke from McConnell

sentence: AUGUST 16 States holding primaries: Alaska, Wyoming Key races to watch: In Wyoming, Representative Liz Cheney, the most visible anti-Trump Republican in Congress, faces Trump-endorsed GOP activist Harriet Hageman.
author: Steve Friess
title: These Are Key Races to Watch In Every State Primary This Election Season
